Pre-Game Insights: Atlanta Braves manager Brian Snitker mentioned that Chris Sale is out for the Wild Card Series against the San Diego Padres due to back issues.
Braves general manager Alex Anthopoulos stated that Sale's back spasms were a result of a recent throwing session and that the decision was made to sit him out for the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves and Mets finished the regular season with identical 89-73 records, securing their playoff spots through tiebreakers.
The game between the Braves and Padres is the first round of the Wild Card Series, which is a best-of-three format.
